projects.title: Projects
projects.newProjectDescription: Set up a new translation project with source and target languages.
projects.deadlineDescription: Set a deadline for this translation project.

projects.referenceFilesDescription: Upload reference files like glossaries, style guides, etc. Unlike work files, references can be added anytime.

projects.fileManagementPolicy: Files must be added during project creation. Per the file management policy, projects without files cannot be created, and files cannot be added or modified after creation.
projects.noReferenceFilesDesc: No reference files have been added to this project yet.
projects.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click to upload

projects.clickToAddNotes: Add special requirements, terminology instructions, or other notes. Click to edit.

projects.projectNotFoundDesc: The project you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.

admin.title: Admin Console
admin.administratorDesc: Can manage all settings, users, TMs, and glossaries.

admin.languageSettingsDesc: Set default language preferences for translation projects.
admin.settingsAffectAll: These settings affect the entire application and all users
admin.noPermission: You don't have permission to access the admin dashboard.

admin.defaultLanguagesDesc: Set the default language preferences for translation projects.
